caption: José Luis Cuevas (1934–2017; born and died Mexico City, Mexico), Printed with collaboration of Henri Deschamps at Atelier Mourlot Ltd., New York, Published by Touchstone Publishers Ltd., New York, List of Titles, from the series Crime by Cuevas, 1968. Color lithograph; 76.2 × 55.9 cm. Gift of Roberta and Harold Delevie in honor of their grandson Nathan Benjamin Agmon, Class of 2017 (2023-62.12)
